type.name: action_request_item
type.description: An extensible select identifying the objects that are the focus of a versioned_action_request.

type.name: versioned_action_request_approval_item
type.description: A versioned_action_request_approval_item extends approval assignment to versioned_action_request instances.

type.name: versioned_action_request_date_and_time_item
type.description: A versioned_action_request_date_and_time_item extends date and time assignment to versioned_action_request instances.

type.name: versioned_action_request_date_item
type.description: A versioned_action_request_date_item extends date assignment to versioned_action_request instances.

type.name: versioned_action_request_document_reference_item
type.description: A versioned_action_request_document_reference_item extends document_reference_item to include versioned_action_request instances.

type.name: versioned_action_request_organization_item
type.description: An versioned_action_request_organization_item extends organization assignment to versioned_action_request instances.

type.name: versioned_action_request_person_and_organization_item
type.description: A versioned_action_request_person_and_organization_item extends person and organization assignment to versioned_action_request instances.

entity.name: applied_action_request_assignment
entity.description: The applied_action_request_assignment entity associates a versioned_action_request (work request) with the items that are thought or planned to be affected by the versioned_action_request (work request).

explicit.name: items
explicit.description: The items that are thought or planned to be affected by the versioned_action_request.

entity.name: versioned_action_request_relationship
entity.description:
A relationship between two versioned_action_requests.
Two versioned_action_requests may be related if they are addressing similar problems.
A versioned_action_request may represent a version of a work request. The different version can be related using versioned_action_request_relationship.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: the text that characterizes the versioned_action_request_relationship.

explicit.name: id
explicit.description: the identifier that distinguishes the versioned_action_request_relationship.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: the label by which the versioned_action_request_relationship is known.

explicit.name: related_versioned_action_request
explicit.description: The other instance of versioned_action_request that is a part of the relationship. If one versioned_action_request in the relationship is dependent upon the other, this attribute shall be the dependent one.

explicit.name: relating_versioned_action_request
explicit.description: One of the instances of versioned_action_request that is being related.
